Work with Roman calendar dates

Source: R/roman.R
cal_roman.Rd

Create a Roman date object.

Usage

cal_roman

Format

An object of class calcal of length 8.

Details

roman_date(66, 4, 1, 1, FALSE) as_roman(Sys.Date())
